00093     {

00103     public function getRawState( $key, $defaultValue = null )
00104     {
00105         $_result = ( isset( $_SESSION[$key] ) ? $this->_unserialize( $_SESSION[$key] ) : $_SESSION[$key] = $defaultValue );
00106         if ( $this->_debugMode ) CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Raw GET:[' . $key . '] = [' . $_result . ']' );
00107         return $_result;
00108     }

00135     public function setRawState( $key, $value, $defaultValue = null )
00136     {
00137         if ( $this->_debugMode ) CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Raw Set:[' . $key . '] = [' . $value . ']' );
00138 
00139         if ( $value === $defaultValue )
00140             unset( $_SESSION[$key] );
00141         else
00142             $_SESSION[$key] = $this->_serialize( $value );
00143     }

00161     public function clearStates()
00162     {
00163         $_baseKey = $this->getInternalKey();
00164         $_length = strlen( $_baseKey );
00165 
00166         foreach ( array_keys( $_SESSION ) as $_key )
00167         {
00168             if ( ! strncmp( $_key, $_baseKey, $_length ) )
00169                 unset( $_SESSION[$_key] );
00170         }
00171     }

00180     public function getFlashes( $delete = true )
00181     {
00182         $_flashList = array();
00183         $_baseKey = $this->getInternalKey( null, true );
00184         $_length = strlen( $_baseKey );
00185 
00186         $_keyList = array_keys( $_SESSION );
00187 
00188         foreach ( $_keyList as $_key )
00189         {
00190             if ( ! strncmp( $_key, $_baseKey, $_length ) )
00191             {
00192                 $_flashList[substr( $_key, $_length )] = $_SESSION[$_key];
00193                 if ( $delete ) unset( $_SESSION[$_key] );
00194             }
00195         }
00196 
00197         if ( $delete ) $this->setRawState( $this->getInternalKey( self::BASE_FLASH_KEY_PREFIX . '.counters', true ), array() );
00198 
00199         return $_flashList;
00200     }
00201 
00211     public function getFlash( $key, $defaultValue = null, $delete = true )
00212     {
00213         $_value = $this->getState( $key, $defaultValue, true );
00214         if ( $delete ) $this->setFlash( $key, null );
00215         return $_value;
00216     }
00217 
00226     public function setFlash( $key, $value, $defaultValue = null )
00227     {
00228         $this->setState( $key, $value, $defaultValue, true );
00229         $_counterList = $this->getState( self::BASE_FLASH_KEY_PREFIX . '.counters', array() );
00230 
00231         if ( $value === $defaultValue )
00232             unset( $_counterList[$key] );
00233         else
00234             $_counterList[$key] = 0;
00235 
00236         $this->setState( self::BASE_FLASH_KEY_PREFIX . '.counters', $_counterList, array() );
00237     }

00243     public function hasFlash( $key )
00244     {

00254     public function getInternalKey( $key = null, $isFlashKey = false )
00255     {
00256         //  Construct the key
00257         $_key = session_id() . '.' . $this->_keyPrefix . ( $isFlashKey ? '.' . self::BASE_FLASH_KEY_PREFIX : null );
00258         if ( ! empty( $key ) ) $_key .= '.' . ( $this->_hashKeys ? md5( $key ) : $key );
00259         if ( $this->_debugMode ) CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Internalize Key:[' . $key . '] => [' . $_key . ']' );
00260         return $_key;
00261     }

00272     protected function _serialize( $value )
00273     {
00274         if ( $this->_serializeData )
00275         {
00276             try
00277             {
00278                 if ( $value instanceof SimpleXMLElement || $value instanceof Util_SpXmlElement )
00279                     return $value->asXML();
00280 
00281                 if ( is_object( $value ) )
00282                     return serialize( $value );
00283             }
00284             catch ( Exception $_ex )
00285             {
00286             }
00287         }
00288 
00289         return $value;
00290     }
00291 
00297     protected function _unserialize( $value )
00298     {
00299         try
00300         {
00301             if ( $this->_isSerialized( $value ) )
00302             {
00303                 if ( $value instanceof SimpleXMLElement || $value instanceof Util_SpXmlElement )
00304                     return simplexml_load_string( $value );
00305 
00306                 return unserialize( $value );
00307             }
00308         }
00309         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00310         {
00311         }
00312 
00313         return $value;
00314     }
00315 
00321     protected function _isSerialized( $value )
00322     {
00323         $_result = @unserialize( $value );
00324         return !( false === $_result && $value != serialize( false ) );
00325     }
